description:
NTS Map: 083E01Elevation Gain: 107 m (351 ft).The Overlander runs along the SE shore of the Athabasca River, and follows some historical terrain.
Net elevation changes are minimal, but the terrain rolls at the north end of the trail.

Singletrack riding, remote, and not too technical, but very scenic, and a great long ride.
directions: Hwy 16, at the Athabasca River, about 20km east of Jasper.
title: Overlander
